https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jSiP0syjDtWniDH3LjNqvHh6FvB.jpg Mahmoud Darwish was a Palestinian poet and author who was regarded as the Palestinian national poet. He won numerous awards for his works. Darwish used Palestine as a metaphor for the loss of Eden, birth and resurrection, and the anguish of dispossession and exile. All About Mahmoud Darwish
